channel.title: Is "FindNormalRandoms;" enough?
channel.description: Well, at the moment I am writing an Iron Miner, and I was wondering if "FindNormalRandoms;" is enough. I am almost sure it is not, but I would like to know how to add other mining AntiRandoms. Sorry if this is a dumb question or in the wrong section.

item.title: Is "FindNormalRandoms;" enough?
item.dc:creator: @Bob_Mrly Bob Mrly
item.description:
@Bob_Mrly wrote:

Ok, thank you a bunch.

Read full topic

item.title: Is "FindNormalRandoms;" enough?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

If you are Doing a skill, most skills have their own randoms, like WoodCutting has Ents, Mining has Gas, Fishing has Whirlpools.

For Mining, You Should Put {.include SRL\SRL\skill\Mining};
and put SetUpSRLMining; in your script, and you will also need FindPickHeadColours, thats for finding your pick head if it flys off, but to find it you need to put FindPick; in there aswell, and also FindGas(x,y); into your script

Read full topic

item.title: Is "FindNormalRandoms;" enough?
item.dc:creator: @Bob_Mrly Bob Mrly
item.description:
@Bob_Mrly wrote:

Well, at the moment I am writing an Iron Miner, and I was wondering if “FindNormalRandoms;” is enough. I am almost sure it is not, but I would like to know how to add other mining AntiRandoms. Sorry if this is a dumb question or in the wrong section.

Read full topic
